EmailTemplate.description: Send email if feedback is not closed or set to in review 3 days past the assignment date
EmailTemplate.name: Feedback: Send Email 3 Days Past Assignment Date
EmailTemplate.subject: PAST DUE Knowledge Feedback Resolution
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Feedback__c.OwnerFullName},
A resolution to feedback record, {!Feedback__c.Link}, has not been provided within the 72-hour SLA period. Click on the link to navigate to the feedback to review and resolve.
Sincerely,
DCP Knowledge
